tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE media_contacts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_name VARCHAR(50),
    organization VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE press_coverage (
	coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	coverage_date DATE,
	coverage_title VARCHAR(150),
	coverage_content TEXT,
	contact_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES media_contacts(contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE media_contacts (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    organization VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE press_coverage (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    headline VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    published_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    media_contact_id UUID REFERENCES media_contacts(id),
    coverage_text TEXT,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE advocacy_campaigns (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    outreach_goal INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE MediaContacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    organization_name VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE PressCoverage (
    coverage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coverage_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    coverage_date DATE,
    coverage_source VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    coverage_url VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    campaign_goal TEXT,
    campaign_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignMedia (
    campaign_media_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    contact_id INT,
    coverage_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES Campaigns(campaign_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES MediaContacts(contact_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (coverage_id) REFERENCES PressCoverage(coverage_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MediaContacts (
  contact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE PressCoverage (
  press_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  coverage_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  source VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
  campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  target_audience VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignCoverage (
  campaign_id UUID,
  press_id UUID,
  PRIMARY KEY (campaign_id, press_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES Campaigns(campaign_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (press_id) REFERENCES PressCoverage(press_id)
);
